Monologue.Current: Водила{Line}“Кусок дерьма!{Line} Поверить не могу!..”{Next}“Всё, что от него требовалось -{Line} нажать на тормоз!{Line} Я так о ней заботился...”
Monologue.Original: Driver{Line}“Piece of crap!{Line} I don’t believe this...!”{Next}“All I did was slam on the brakes. Man!{Line} I’ve been takin’ such good care of it!”

Monologue.Current: “Чёртов придурок!{Line} Я его убью!”
Monologue.Original: “It’s all that idiot’s fault{Line} for poppin’ up like that.{Line} I’m gonna kill him!”

Monologue.Current: Водила{Line}“Проклятье!”
Monologue.Original: Driver{Line}“Dammit!”

Monologue.Current: Администратор прокатной фирмы{Line}“Простите, но сейчас{Line} у нас нет машин.”
Monologue.Original: Car Rental Receptionist{Line}“Sorry, we’re all out of{Line} cars right now.”

Monologue.Current: “Но я могу рассказать вам о преимуществах{Line} и не... прочих особенносятх проката.”{Line}Расскажите{Line}Я всё прекрасно знаю
Monologue.Original: “I can tell you which rental{Line} places are good or bad.”{Line}Tell me{Line}I already have that information

Monologue.Current: “Аренда машины - это лучший способ{Line} избежать нежелательных встреч{Line} за пределами города.”
Monologue.Original: “Renting a car is the best way{Line} to avoid those nasty monsters{Line} outside the city.”

Monologue.Current: “Разумеется машине нужно топливо.”
Monologue.Original: “You’ll need to buy{Line} fuel, of course.”

Monologue.Current: “При аренде, мы заливаем полный бак.{Line} Бесплатно. Дополнительное топливо{Line} вы можете приобрести в магазине.”
Monologue.Original: “When you rent a car, we offer a{Line} full tank, free of charge. You can{Line} buy extra fuel at item shops.”

Monologue.Current: “Цена аренды постоянна.{Line} Она не зависит от срока, на который{Line} вы берёте автомобиль. Но как только{Line} вы возвращаетесь в город, аренда истекает.”
Monologue.Original: “We charge a flat rate for our rentals.{Line} As soon as you drive back into{Line} the city, your rental period ends,{Line} so make sure you get the most out of it.”

Monologue.Current: Администратор прокатной фирмы{Line}“Хотите взять машину на прокат?{Line} Быстро, весело и безопасно!”
Monologue.Original: Car Rental Receptionist{Line}“Interested in taking a trip? Rent a car{Line} today. It’s fun, and safe, too.”

Monologue.Current: “Какую машину желаете?{Line} Обе обойдутся вам в 3,500 гилей.”{Line}Небесно голубой пикап{Line}Классический автомобиль{Line}Нет, спасибо.
Monologue.Original: “Which one do you want?{Line} They’re both 3,500 Gil.”{Line}Sky blue van{Line}Classic car{Line}...Forget it

Monologue.Current: “Простите, но у вас{Line} недостаточно средств...”
Monologue.Original: “You don’t have enough...”

Monologue.Current: “Эй, вы ведь из нашего сада, верно?{Line} Есть новости о летнем фестивале?”{Next}“Мы с девушкой хотели бы выступить{Line} там с нашей группой.”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, you’re a student at the Garden, right?{Line} What’s the news on the Garden Festival?”{Next}“Me and my girl are definitely gonna{Line} be there with our band, all right?{Line} I’ll see you guys then.”

Monologue.Current: “Я могу испонлить почти всё,{Line} что угодно! Но больше всего{Line} люблю петь баллады. Приходите,{Line} послушайте, если интересно.”
Monologue.Original: “I can perform almost anything but{Line} my specialty is singing ballads.{Line} Come by and listen if you’re interested.”

Monologue.Current: “Нам всё ещё не хватает людей...”
Monologue.Original: “We still need{Line} more members...”

Monologue.Current: “Where are you SeeDs off to now?{Line} Are you gonna go fight some war?”
Monologue.Original: “Where are you SeeDs off to now?{Line} Are you gonna go fight some war?”

Monologue.Current: // Девчонка у столба{Line}“Эта униформа так{Line} здорово смотрится...”
Monologue.Original: “That uniform{Line} looks cool...”

Monologue.Current: // Парень у столба{Line}“А давай наденем, что-нибудь{Line} похожее на выступление!”
Monologue.Original: “Hey I got an idea. Let’s wear{Line} something like that for our performance!”

Monologue.Current: “Ok, be careful.{Line} See you around!”
Monologue.Original: “Ok, be careful.{Line} See you around!”

Monologue.Current: Механик{Line}“Эй, парень, не хочешь{Line} стать механиком?”{Next}“У меня был помощник,{Line} но он почему-то ушёл...”{Next}“Может, тебе на роду написано{Line} стать великим механиком!{Line} Попробуешь, а?..”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“Hey man, you interested{Line} in becoming a mechanic?”{Next}“I had an assistant{Line} but he quit{Line} for some reason.”{Next}“You might have the right stuff{Line} to become a great mechanic.{Line} Why don’t you give it a try, huh?”

Monologue.Current: Механик{Line}“Теперь у меня есть помощник.{Line} Но лишние руки всегда нужны.”{Next}“Смотри, у тебя всё ещё{Line} есть шанс!”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“I got an assistant now, but{Line} I can always use another.”{Next}“This could be a good{Line} opportunity for you.”

Monologue.Current: New Assistant{Line}“The boss keeps raving about this guy Zell{Line} who grew up here, but I’ve never seen him.”{Next}“Must be some major stud...”
Monologue.Original: New Assistant{Line}“The boss keeps raving about this guy Zell{Line} who grew up here, but I’ve never seen him.”{Next}“Must be some major stud...”

Monologue.Current: // Если Зелл в команде{Line}Механик{Line}“Опять не то... Опять не пашет...{Line} Аааааргх! Чтоб тебя!..”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“Oh, I screwed up! Dammit!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Эй, что стряслось?!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Hey, what’s up!?”

Monologue.Current: Механик{Line}“{Char Zell}!!! Как же я рад{Line} тебя видеть, парень!..”{Next}“Слушай, эта старая консервная{Line} банка опять не заводится...{Line} Не посмотришь?”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“Zell! How you doin’?{Line} Man, good timing!”{Next}“I’m havin’ problems{Line} with this thing right here.{Line} Can you take this off?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Конечно, без проблем!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Sure! No prob!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Готово.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“...Done.”

Monologue.Current: Механик{Line}“Потрясающе! Как же мне не{Line} хватает такого помощника...”{Next}“В последнее время я все{Line} чаще думаю об этом.”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“Great! Man, I really {Line} need a guy like you here.”{Next}“Lately, I’ve been seriously{Line} thinking about that.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Хахаха, вы это уже{Line} лет пять говорите!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Heh-heh... You’ve been sayin’{Line} that for the last 5 years.”

Monologue.Current: “Но и я не меняюсь.{Line} Помощник из меня хреновый,{Line} а вот своими кулаками я{Line} нехило укреплю позиции сидов!”
Monologue.Original: “And yeah, my mind still hasn’t changed.{Line} I’m gonna live out my life as a SeeD,{Line} bustin’ with these fists o’mine.”

Monologue.Current: Механик{Line}“Я недавно разговаривал с твоей{Line} мамой. Она волнуется... Из-за{Line} будущего, которое ты выбрал.”{Next}“Но... я гляжу. ты уверенно шагаешь{Line} по этому пути. Это чертовски здорово,{Line} парень. Так что не останавливайся и...{Line} стань лучшим бойцом на свете!”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“I talked to your mother the other day.{Line} She was worried about you, kid.{Line} You know, about your future.”{Next}“But you look pretty focused about what you{Line} wanna do, so I’m not worried. Hell, you might{Line} just become the best fighter in the world.”

Monologue.Current: Mechanic{Line}“Zell! Long time, kid!{Line} How you doin’?”{Next}“This here’s my new assistant.{Line} I figured you were never gonna{Line} work for me, so I had to get him.”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“Zell! Long time, kid!{Line} How you doin’?”{Next}“This here’s my new assistant.{Line} I figured you were never gonna{Line} work for me, so I had to get him.”

Monologue.Current: New Assistant{Line}“Nice to meet you finally!”
Monologue.Original: New Assistant{Line}“Nice to meet you finally!”

Monologue.Current: New Assistant{Line}“I’ve heard a lot{Line} of stuff about you!”
Monologue.Original: New Assistant{Line}“I’ve heard a lot{Line} of stuff about you!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Huh?{Line} What stuff!?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Huh?{Line} What stuff!?”

Monologue.Current: Mechanic{Line}“Heh heh heh.{Line} Lots of bad stuff.{Line} You have every right to worry.”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“Heh heh heh.{Line} Lots of bad stuff.{Line} You have every right to worry.”

Monologue.Current: New Assistant{Line}“Hardly. You’re{Line} like a legend here.”
Monologue.Original: New Assistant{Line}“Hardly. You’re{Line} like a legend here.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“Really? Why?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Really? Why?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“A legend? Wow.{Line} What did he do?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“A legend? Wow.{Line} What did he do?”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“No way!{Line} What’d he do?”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“No way!{Line} What’d he do?”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“Oh yeah? Tell us about it.{Line} I wanna see how it compares{Line} to my legendary heroics.”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“Oh yeah? Tell us about it.{Line} I wanna see how it compares{Line} to my legendary heroics.”

Monologue.Current: New Assistant{Line}“Well, I guess he’s most known for{Line} doing the most grueling pull-ups.”
Monologue.Original: New Assistant{Line}“Well, I guess he’s most known for{Line} doing the most grueling pull-ups.”

Monologue.Current: “See that sign up there? Once, he climbed{Line} up there and did a hundred pull-ups!{Line} Can you imagine that!?”
Monologue.Original: “See that sign up there? Once, he climbed{Line} up there and did a hundred pull-ups!{Line} Can you imagine that!?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Yeah, what do you guys{Line} think about that, huh?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Yeah, what do you guys{Line} think about that, huh?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“......”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“......”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“You win...{Line} I wasn’t that stupid...”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“You win...{Line} I wasn’t that stupid...”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“I guess even the insane{Line} can become legends, too.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I guess even the insane{Line} can become legends, too.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“...{Pause 88}You haven’t changed a bit, have you?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“...{Pause 88}You haven’t changed a bit, have you?”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“Umm...”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“Umm...”

Monologue.Current: “I think you need{Line} some help.”
Monologue.Original: “I think you need{Line} some help.”

Monologue.Current: New Assistant{Line}“I’m surprised you’re not impressed.{Line} It’s the most well-known legend in our town.”
Monologue.Original: New Assistant{Line}“I’m surprised you’re not impressed.{Line} It’s the most well-known legend in our town.”

Monologue.Current: Mechanic{Line}“However you take it,{Line} Zell sure is{Line} one of a kind.”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“However you take it,{Line} Zell sure is{Line} one of a kind.”

Monologue.Current: “I’m so happy to be back here. For a while,{Line} I didn’t know what I was gonna do.”
Monologue.Original: “I’m so happy to be back here. For a while,{Line} I didn’t know what I was gonna do.”

Monologue.Current: “It’s been crazy lately. First, we see the{Line} Garden flying by, and next thing you know,{Line} the Galbadians are taking over our town.”
Monologue.Original: “It’s been crazy lately. First, we see the{Line} Garden flying by, and next thing you know,{Line} the Galbadians are taking over our town.”

Monologue.Current: “What’s next? Sorceresses, monsters,{Line} natural disasters? Geez!”
Monologue.Original: “What’s next? Sorceresses, monsters,{Line} natural disasters? Geez!”

Monologue.Current: New Assistant{Line}“Boss, we did it. The {Term Galbadia}ns{Line} are gone, and so is their Garden.”
Monologue.Original: New Assistant{Line}“Boss, we did it. The {Term Galbadia}ns{Line} are gone, and so is their Garden.”

Monologue.Current: “Thanks for all your help.{Line} Now the boss can{Line} rest in peace.”
Monologue.Original: “Thanks for all your help.{Line} Now the boss can{Line} rest in peace.”

Monologue.Current: Mechanic{Line}“YO! I’m still alive,{Line} bonehead!”
Monologue.Original: Mechanic{Line}“YO! I’m still alive,{Line} bonehead!”

Monologue.Current: New Assistant{Line}“Boss, is that you!? Oh man!{Line} I thought you were dead for sure!”
Monologue.Original: New Assistant{Line}“Boss, is that you!? Oh man!{Line} I thought you were dead for sure!”

Monologue.Current: New Assistant{Line}“You know...{Line} I was wondering...”
Monologue.Original: New Assistant{Line}“You know...{Line} I was wondering...”

Monologue.Current: “If my boss had croaked, do you think{Line} he would’ve left me the shop?”
Monologue.Original: “If my boss had croaked, do you think{Line} he would’ve left me the shop?”

Monologue.Current: “Hey Zell, do you know a girl{Line} at the Garden with a pigtail?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey Zell, do you know a girl{Line} at the Garden with a pigtail?”

Monologue.Current: “She came by your house{Line} the other day.”
Monologue.Original: “She came by your house{Line} the other day.”

Monologue.Current: “Может, сыграем в карты?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “Let’s play cards.”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: “Hey you... Heard you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} Balamb’s rules and ours.”
Monologue.Original: “Hey you... Heard you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} Balamb’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: “Hey you... Heard you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} Galbadia’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Original: “Hey you... Heard you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} Centra’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Original: “Hey you... Heard you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} FH’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Original: “Hey you... Heard you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} Lunar’s rules and ours.”
